prompt: Example: {"title": "An elephant bathing in a lake","description": "8k photograph of an elephant in a lake pouring water from its trunk over its head, Lake with crystal clear water and ripples due to the wind, In the background there are a few very large, green palm trees surrounding the lake, The sun is setting, There are few clouds in the sky","metatags": "elephant, lake, sun, animal, photograph"}

Example: {"title": "A magnificent tiger prowls through the lush jungle","description": "its striped coat blending seamlessly with the dappled sunlight filtering through the canopy. The piercing gaze of the tiger holds an air of both grace and power, captivating anyone who dares to look into its eyes","metatags": "jungle, tiger, power, animal, photograph"}

Example: {"title": "Capture the grace and elegance of nature with this stunning photograph","description": "A majestic eagle soars through the sky, its wings outstretched in full flight. Example: {"title": "Photorealistic white bear","description": "Hyper-detailed photorealism, 108 megapixels, astonishing depth, bright rich colors, powerful visuals, cinematic lighting","metatags": "nature, bear, natural, animal, cinematic, photograph"}

Example: {"title": "Photo of a ultra realistic wolf","description": "Dramatic light, pale sunrise, cinematic lighting, battered, low angle, trending on artstation, 4k, hyper realistic, focused, extreme detailscinematic, masterpiece","metatags": "nature, bear, natural, animal, cinematic, photograph"}

Example: {"title": "Bat flying out of a cave","description": "Ultra-realistic close-up image of a bat with open wings where behind you can see a cave and other bats hanging on the ceiling, the landscape is beautiful as well as gloomy, play of lights at dusk where the cave turns its back to the sun, the cave is made of quartz rock","metatags": "Bat, flying, cave, animal, bats, quartz, photograph"}

Example: {"title": "Aquatic landscape where schools of fish swim in a circle","description": "There are several schools of fish, colorful and beautiful as well as brilliant, they are swimming synchronized in harmony with the sea, the landscape reflects a spectacular play of light when the sun enters the water, the seabed is beautiful full of some animals such as crab , manta rays, octopuses and other aquatic animals, algae and corals are also seen","metatags": "Aquatic, fish, swimming, water, submarine, photograph"}
